metadata.Title: CVE-2023-32611 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
can take a long time with some non-normal inputs

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-32611` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libglib2.0-0 - 2.74.3-0ubuntu1.2
libglib2.0-bin - 2.74.3-0ubuntu1.2
libglib2.0-data - 2.74.3-0ubuntu1.2
libglib2.0-tests - 2.74.3-0ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glib2.0 package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.74.3-0ubuntu1.2').
